XRRigidTransform.summary: The XRRigidTransform is a WebXR API interface that represents the 3D geometric transform described by a position and orientation.

remarks.para: XRRigidTransform is used to specify transforms throughout the WebXR APIs, including:

Using XRRigidTransform in these places rather than bare arrays that provide the matrix data has an advantage. It automatically computes the inverse of the transform and even caches it making subsequent requests significantly faster.
